name: change-black-and-latinx-directory
description: ### To run the application: 1. Install node. 2. Navigate to change-black-and-latinx-directory (which you likely are already in) in your terminal. 3. If you haven't already, run `npm install` in your terminal to install all required dependencies 4. In your terminal, run `node app` 5. In your browser, navigate to `localhost:8080` and you should be good to go!
